snippet: Pitcher Mo’Ne Davis led her team into the Little League World Series, throwing a three-hitter to lead Taney Youth Baseball Association Little League of Philadelphia to an 8-0 victory over Delaware-Newark National Little League.
abstract: Pitcher Mo’Ne Davis leads her team into the Little League World Series, throwing a three-hitter to lead Taney Youth Baseball Assn Little League of Philadelphia to an 8-0 victory over Delaware-Newark National Little League.
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Mo’Ne Davis led her team into the Little League World Series, throwing a three-hitter to lead Taney Youth Baseball Association Little League of Philadelphia to an 8-0 victory over Delaware-Newark National Little League.

headline.main: Girl Helps Her Team Advance to World Series
headline.print_headline: Girl Helps Her Team Advance to World Series
